attributes.action: Take action against YouTube for allowing sexual content to 'slip through the net'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
YouTube.co.uk is a great resource for video clips and is also a good social networking site, but the sexual content on there is shocking - and easily accessible to our children.

Please will our Government take action to make the owners take responsibility for all content posted, it's simply not good enough to get users to flag up inappropriate content.

Banning 'adult' keywords would be a step in the right direction.

Lets get some decency back into society and stop the rot before it's too late.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
